body_html:
I got by this error but am still stuck. Will open another issue as it has nothing to do with this one. In case others have this problem:

See bazelbuild/bazel#760

You need to edit tensorflow/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL and make the same gcc / cpp / linker_flag / cxx_builtin_include_directory adjustments.

body:
I got by this error but am still stuck. Will open another issue as it has nothing to do with this one. In case others have this problem:

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/760

You need to edit tensorflow/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL and make the same gcc / cpp / linker_flag / cxx_builtin_include_directory adjustments.
